text: Lake Rychy (), Richi (), or Richu () is a freshwater lake shared by the Braslaw District of Vitebsk Region, Belarus, and Daugavpils Municipality, Latvia. The lake is second-deepest in Belarus and fourth-deepest in Latvia. ==References== Rychy Rychy Category:Belarus–Latvia border Category:Braslaw District Category:Daugavpils Municipality
title: Lake Rychy
